titleStmt.title: The poore mans Pater noster with a preparatiue to praier: wherto are annexed diuers godly psalmes and meditations: collected out of the sacred scriptures, by Thomas Timme minister.
titleStmt.author: Tymme, Thomas, d. 1620.

publicationStmt.publisher: Newly imprinted the second time by Peter Short, dwelling on Bredstreet hill, at the signe of the Starre,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Bredstreet hill, at the signe of the Starre
